column1: Baby Barnaby's////The Green Eggs and Ham breakfast (sub bacon for the apple wood chicken sausage) is TO. DIE. FOR.  If it weren't for the pesky weekend wait this would be a full 5 stars.  And considering it's Houston we're dealing with
column2: waiting outside can be seriously brutal in the heat.  They do provide self serve ice water and coffee for the people toughing it out
column3: but I would opt for one of the other Barnaby's if it's not too late (the others stop serving breakfast at 11am).  And I'll say there have been late mornings after a late night that I've decided that it's worth the wait to get the breakfast/brunch when I have the craving bad
